vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.38;
son of: Achbor (H5907)
§ Baal-hanan = "Baal is gracious"
1) an early king of Edom
2) one of David's officers, a Gederite, who had the superintendence of his olive and sycamore plantations
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Acbor; rey de Edom; (b)   hombre
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴勒哈南 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "巴勒是恩慈的"
1) 早期的以東王
2) 大衛王的官員之一, 基第利人, 他掌管高原橄欖樹和桑樹 {#代上 27:28|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴勒哈南 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "巴勒是恩慈的"
1) 早期的以东王
2) 大卫王的官员之一, 基第利人, 他掌管高原橄榄树和桑树 {#代上 27:28|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.28
§ Baal-hanan = "Baal is gracious"
1) an early king of Edom
2) one of David's officers, a Gederite, who had the superintendence of his olive and sycamore plantations
